entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@Surgeon_General @WhiteHouse Structural racism translates into chronic, group exposure to a higher viral load in general, vs higher class/typically white people.

Exposure to a higher initial viral load makes it harder for ANY body to fight back - that's giving the virus a head start. https://t.co/681OKP7skB
